sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"舒适，安逸，悠闲"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: comfort, ease, leisure, relaxation, relief, rest
means: comfort ： 通常指在摆脱烦人、痛苦的事情，或在要求、愿望得到满足后所感到的舒适。
ease ： 指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。
leisure ： 专指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。
relaxation ： 强调消除肌肉疲劳或思想的紧张状态，使身心松弛，得到休息。
relief ： 侧重有消除痛苦、不适或困难的负担，常暗含不利因素已不存在的意味。
rest与work相对，强调水分除身心痛劳，不着重休息方式。

sentence.Network_en: The leisure facilities are there for the use of guests.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些休闲设施是供客人使用的。

sentence.Network_en: The Leisure Center is a long and low modern building.
sentence.Network_cn: 休闲中心是一座狭长而低矮的现代建筑。

sentence.Network_en: Reading books does not rate highly among Britons as a leisure activity.
sentence.Network_cn: 读书并非英国人很喜欢的休闲活动。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 休闲一词外国人称休闲(Leisure)或游憩(Recriation)，古代中国人称玩或休闲。而休息是为走更远的路，中国人认为闲能生慧，心闲体 …

lj.lj_ly: the rest of the day can be spent at leisure.
lj.lj_ls: 这天剩下的时间可以轻松度过了。

lj.lj_ly: the poems were left for others to read at leisure.
lj.lj_ls: 这些诗是留给别人慢慢去读的。

jx.jx_en_mean: a woman or man of independent means or whose time is free from obligations to others
jx.jx_cn_mean: （经济独立或没有负担的）悠闲女士（或男士）

jx.jx_en_mean: When one has free time; at one's convenience
jx.jx_cn_mean: 当某人有自由时间时；在某人方便时

lj.lj_ly: I'll return the call at my leisure.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French leisir, based on Latin licere 'be allowed'

entry.def: Leisure is the time when you are not working and you can relax and do things that you enjoy.

example.ex: ...a relaxing way to fill my leisure time.
example.tran: 我打发空余时间的轻松办法

example.ex: ...one of Britain's most popular leisure activities.
example.tran: 英国最受欢迎的休闲活动之一

entry.tran: 从容不迫；不慌不忙；慢悠悠
entry.def: If someone does something at leisure or at their leisure, they enjoy themselves by doing it when they want to, without hurrying.

example.ex: You will be able to stroll at leisure through the gardens...
He could read all the national papers at his leisure.
example.tran: 他可以悠然阅读所有的全国性报纸。

means.word_mean: 1. time available for ease and relaxation;
2. freedom to choose a pastime or enjoyable activity;

auth_sentence.content: Balancing your life, work, leisure-time and relationships.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Balancing your life, work, leisure-time and relationships.

auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, leisure travel has held up remarkably well.

auth_sentence.res_content: The Laird...had devoted his leisure untill tillage and agriculture.

Sentence.sentence: there's little time left for leisure activities for many Americans.
In a UK survey on leisure time activities
What was the most popular leisure activity in the US?
Compared with early generations we spend more and more time working and have less and less free time to engage in leisure pursues.
So we have a great amount of time for leisure than in decades past
More activities to fill in their leisure time.

sentences.en: I have not a moment's leisure.
He read books at his leisure.
He likes leisure and hates work.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢安逸, 讨厌工作。

jushi.english: I have not a moment's leisure.
He read books at his leisure.
He likes leisure and hates work.
